events.name: Optimizing Collection Facility Operations
events.wd_description: The number of publications in the field of spent LIB recovery has grown, highlighting the importance of optimizing collection facility operations (e.g., dismantling).
events.description: The number of publications in the field of spent LIB recovery has grown, highlighting the importance of optimizing collection facility operations (e.g., dismantling).

events.name: Sequential Deployment of Recycling Plants
events.wd_description: Developed an optimization model that allowed a sequential deployment of recycling plants over time.
events.description: Developed an optimization model that allowed a sequential deployment of recycling plants over time.

events.name: Future Supply Chain Network Design
events.wd_description: Designed a future supply chain network for spent LIBs in Sweden.
events.description: Designed a future supply chain network for spent LIBs in Sweden.

events.name: Geospatial Modeling
events.wd_description: Applied geospatial modeling to determine the optimal facility locations for LIB recycling in California with the goal of minimizing the cost and GHG emissions.
events.description: Applied geospatial modeling to determine the optimal facility locations for LIB recycling in California with the goal of minimizing the cost and GHG emissions.

events.name: Comparing Virgin Production and Pyrometallurgical Recycling
events.wd_label: Comparing Virgin Production and Pyrometallurgical Recycling
events.wd_description: Used LCA to compare LIB virgin production with pyrometallurgical recycling.
events.description: Used LCA to compare LIB virgin production with pyrometallurgical recycling.

events.name: Material Recovery from Pyro-process
events.wd_description: Found that material recovery from pyro-process was able to lower the primary energy demand by 6—56% and decrease GHG emissions by 23%.
events.description: Found that material recovery from pyro-process was able to lower the primary energy demand by 6—56% and decrease GHG emissions by 23%.

events.name: Comparing Virgin Production and Pyrometallurgical Recycling
events.wd_label: Comparing Virgin Production and Pyrometallurgical Recycling
events.wd_description: Found that virgin production had a higher energy demand than pyrometallurgical recycling.
events.description: Found that virgin production had a higher energy demand than pyrometallurgical recycling.
